thread.title: Ethiopia: State Minster, Ambassador Berhane Gebre-Christos Meets Members of the European Council On Tourism and Trade
thread.title_full: Ethiopia: State Minster, Ambassador Berhane Gebre-Christos Meets Members of the European Council On Tourism and Trade

title: Ethiopia: State Minster, Ambassador Berhane Gebre-Christos Meets Members of the European Council On Tourism and Trade
text:
Kenya: I Won't Honour Kenya Court Call - Bensouda 
Professor Dr. Anton Caragea, President of the European Council on Tourism and Trade said members of the Council had been welcomed by excellent Ethiopian hospitality. 
He told the State Minster that the Council's award was a good beginning for promotion of Ethiopian tourism and the Council would work closely to make Ethiopia known across the world. 
He said Ethiopia should exploit this opportunity to attract more tourists from Europe and encourage the establishment of Honorary Consulates where there were no embassies to inform tourists about tourism destinations in Ethiopia. Ethiopia 
The third conference on "Financing For Development" opened on Sunday in Addis Ababa with raising of commemoration flags. see more » Copyright © 2015 Government of Ethiopia. All rights reserved.
